Paragraph: To our best knowledge , the efficiency is among the highest reported to date for side - chain D-A conjugated copolymers and is twice higher than that of the main - chain D-A counterpart polymer PBDTDPP-OR in the single BHJ PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| side-chain D-A conjugated copolymers |
| main-chain D-A counterpart polymer PBDTDPP-OR |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| side-chain D-A conjugated copolymers |
| PBDTDPP-OR |

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "To our best knowledge" (this is a phrase that does not refer to a specific material name)
* "BHJ PSCs" (this is an abbreviation that refers to "bithiophene-based organic photovoltaic cells")

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
